articles.author: Nicholas Vinocur
articles.title: Romania’s far-right, pro-Russian lurch spells big trouble for EU and NATO - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The victory of ultranationalist Călin Georgescu is sparking fear that Romania could slide into the growing pro-Moscow camp.
articles.content: Reformist Elena Lasconi, who will face him in the runoff on Dec. 8, is directly warning that Romanians must now rally together to stop the country falling back under the thrall of Russia, which occup… [+1589 chars]
